detectors.description:
StakingPoolRewarder.updateVestingSchedule(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (contracts/StakingPoolRewarder.sol#97-125) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(amount > 0,StakingPoolRewarder: zero amount) (contracts/StakingPoolRewarder.sol#106)
	- require(bool,string)(startTime < endTime,StakingPoolRewarder: invalid time range) (contracts/StakingPoolRewarder.sol#107)
	- require(bool,string)(step > 0 && endTime.sub(startTime) % step == 0,StakingPoolRewarder: invalid step) (contracts/StakingPoolRewarder.sol#108)
	- require(bool,string)(uint256(uint128(amount)) == amount,StakingPoolRewarder: amount overflow) (contracts/StakingPoolRewarder.sol#111)
	- require(bool,string)(uint256(uint32(startTime)) == startTime,StakingPoolRewarder: startTime overflow) (contracts/StakingPoolRewarder.sol#112)
	- require(bool,string)(uint256(uint32(endTime)) == endTime,StakingPoolRewarder: endTime overflow) (contracts/StakingPoolRewarder.sol#113)
